name: Space Face
description:
As the product of an university project week's worth of work, Space Face is a game where the player is an astronaut that must help a human make facial expressions. Once the expression has been matched, you win!

Since this was made during a week, scope had to be really small. If the team decides to develop it further, we'll add the following:

  • More facial expressions, buttons and lever types
  • More levels with increasing difficulties

Features:

  • Pattern-based puzzles with movement mechanics
  • Zero gravity phsyics based player movement
  • Bizarre and gloomy space ambience

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow keys to move the astronaut.

Credits:

  • Derek Nicoll
  • Thomas Greentree
  • Charmaine Lim
  • Juan Rodriguez (@timrodz)
  • Mitchell Currie
